take_a_tour: Ni ubwa mbere ugeze hano? Fata urugendo!

step_1.paragraph_1: Agasanduku k'ishakisha ni inkingi y'ingenzi ya moteri y'ishakisha. Karemera amagambo asanzwe, interuro, nibindi (ni ukuvuga 'ibiryo byo mu rugo')
step_1.paragraph_2: Uko wandika, agasanduku ko gushakisha kazatanga ibitekerezo bishingiye ku byiciro dukoresha inyuma y'amashusho. Ibi bitekerezo bizatanga ibisubizo nyabyo, ariko ntabwo ari ngombwa kubikoresha.
step_1.paragraph_3: Nuhitamo kudakoresha ibitekerezo byatanzwe, tuzakoresha inyandiko utanga kugira ngo tubone ibisubizo nyabyo bishoboka.

step_2.paragraph_1: Ntuzi neza icyo ushaka? Nta kibazo!
step_2.paragraph_2: Dutanga ibyiciro byinshi bitandukanye n'ibyiciro bito kugirango urebe. Kanda gusa kuri iyo link iyo ari yo yose iri mu gice cy'ibyiciro kugira ngo ugerwe ku bisubizo by'ishakisha.

step_3.paragraph_1: Hari igihe ibintu bicika, tudatekereza ko bizacika.
step_3.paragraph_2: Niba hari ikintu cyangiritse, cyangwa se ukaba ushaka gutanga ibitekerezo ku buryo rusange, ushobora gukanda kuri buto yo gutanga ibitekerezo igihe icyo ari cyo cyose.

step_4.paragraph_1: Ongeraho aderesi yawe hano kugira ngo ubone serivisi ziboneka mu gace utuyemo. Ibi bidufasha kukwereka gusa amahitamo aboneka mu gace utuyemo.

callouts.title: Hariho n'ubundi buryo bwo gusaba ubufasha:
